product.title: UNOMOR 8pcs Hot Roller Pin Replacement Clips for Women Versatile Hairstyling
product.description:
Description

Replacement hot roller clips have enough quantity to meet your daily styling needs. its compact and lightweight design makes it portable and easy to use, allowing you to use easily. With our hot roller curlers, you can perm by yourself.-curler clips hot rollers

Features

-Color:Silver
-Material:304 Stainless steel
-Size:7.00X4.45X0.50cm/2.75X1.75X0.20in

-Enjoy effortless styling without the need for salon visits, as you can perm .-travel hot rollers hair
-Get creative and experiment with different styles and looks to find the for any occasion.-hot roller replacement
-Roller clips are small in size and light weight, it wont take up too much space, which is very convenient.-replacement curl roller
-Flexible yet retains its shape, good to create a variety of hairstyles with these hair roller clips.-lint rollers refills
